price: İşte Âd! Rabbinin ayetlerini bile bile inkâr ettiler ve O’nun elçilerine isyan edip, her inatçı zorba emrine uydular.
arabic: وَتِلۡكَ عَادٞۖ جَحَدُواْ بِـَٔايَٰتِ رَبِّهِمۡ وَعَصَوۡاْ رُسُلَهُۥ وَٱتَّبَعُوٓاْ أَمۡرَ كُلِّ جَبَّارٍ عَنِيدٖ

version.title: Turkish translation - Shaaban Britsh
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Shaaban Britsh. Notice: Some referred translated verses corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: watil'ka ʿādun jaḥadū biāyāti rabbihim waʿaṣaw rusulahu wa-ittabaʿū amra kulli jabbārin ʿanīdin
